content.question: Which of the following examples best illustrates the role of the medulla in regulating behavior?

choices.label: As Shericka starts to run, her heart and breathing rates increase.
Ludwig hears his favorite instrument as the musicians begin to play.
After touching the hot stove, Julia reflexively pulls her hand away.
When playing chess, Judit reaches out to move one of her pieces on the game board.

content.answer: As Shericka starts to run, her heart and breathing rates increase.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
